# iru_device (Data Source)

Get detailed information for a specific device, including its name, serial number, platform, and assignment status.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iru_device" "example" {
  id = "your-device-uuid"
}

output "device_name" {
  value = data.iru_device.example.device_name
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The unique identifier for the Device.

### Read-Only

- `asset_tag` (String)
- `blueprint_id` (String)
- `device_name` (String)
- `os_version` (String)
- `platform` (String)
- `serial_number` (String)
- `user_id` (String)
